name: sudo Hack
description:
Just hack your way around in this classic puzzle game!

Connect the green right side to the left to transfer the data:

  • Click on pipes to rotate them 90 degrees.
  • Conected pipes to the starting point must create a closed circuit to the end, there cannot be unclosed flows.
  • Do it before the time runs!
  • Each remaining time is added to the next level!
  • 10 levels, and 90 more to come!!

Check out my other games!
